posts.title: iOS Multiboot
posts.desc: An iOS multiboot writeup covering untethered nand_firmware flash boot method.

posts.title: iOS 5.x iBoot HFS+ heap buffer overflow
posts.desc: From a filesystem driver bug to unsigned code execution. A writeup about HFS+ header catalog.extents[1].blockcount on iBoot-1219.x and lower.

posts.title: De Rebus Antiquis
posts.desc: Exploiting the old iOS 7.x bootchain. A complementary writeup about Xerub's recursive stack overflow bug in iBoot-1940.x and lower.
